channel.title: How Do I Join A New Server?
channel.description:
I have Hamachi, I log in to the thing with the correct Network Name, and Password
Open MoparScape as usual, go to File -> New Server -> [SERVER IP] -> Ok
Then, File -> New Port -> [PORT NUMBER]
Try to log in, but it won't let me. :O
I have tried this with numerous servers, so I doubt it is because the server is Offline.
*NOTE: I have never logged into MoparScape on somebody elses server.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 04:49:14 PM[/size][hr]Incase it helps; I [b]do[/b] use a Router. (Belkin54g)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 05:41:35 PM[/size][hr]Going to bed now, please post! I look forward to having some help in the morning!
Luv y'all. <3[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 05:48:04 PM[/size][hr]Thanks for the help. -.-

item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

I have Hamachi, I log in to the thing with the correct Network Name, and Password

Open MoparScape as usual, go to File -> New Server -> [SERVER IP] -> Ok

Then, File -> New Port -> [PORT NUMBER]

Try to log in, but it won’t let me.

I have tried this with numerous servers, so I doubt it is because the server is Offline.
